item.title: MIUI OS2.0.210.0.VNNCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K70 Ultra China

Codename: rothko

Version: OS2.0.210.0.VNNCNXM | 15.0

Size: 9.6 GB

MD5: 5db861a8d84e6fb8e558725a415faf51

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to September 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.20.0.UNNCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K70 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K70 Ultra China

Codename: rothko

Version: OS1.0.20.0.UNNCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: dea22370a947bf68631f3a0c842f15c6

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Camera previews and WeChat video calls
Optimization: Wi-Fi connectivity in specific network environments
Optimization: Bluetooth audio playback for car systems
[System]
New: 5G-A capabilities for better 5G connectivity (available when provided by your carrier)
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed

Download: Here
